about_the_game:
Commander!
You find yourself sheltered with some survivors in a former nuclear power plant after some serious events that befell humanity in the new century.
Manage the factory, obtain resources to make different types of boxes to fool bandits, send expeditions to find everything you can, repair work areas, face enemies to defend your facilities, deploy drones and radio controlled cars to Secure the perimeter and find items after battles and prepare for special events.
This and much more in a great management game. It's our story!

Shelter Survivors
Hunt other commanders in events
Avoid being sabotaged by denying entry to enemies
Send drops to other players
Your mood will be reflected in the sun
Real time management
And thousands of other things! Discover them!

name: Level UP! Factory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5 3GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Commander! Manage your shelter with survivors in a abandoned nuclear power plant. Search resources to make different types of boxes, send expeditions, repair work areas, face enemies to defend your facilities, deploy drones and rc cars, prepare for special events and more. All in real-time.
